attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The newly unveiled logo has been variously described thus,

"Another PC attempt at branding. Let's not upset anyone by having anything British, English or anything that's remotely to do with London at all!"

"Hitler would have approved a design like this for the 1936 Berlin Olympics!"

"It looks like somebody that's been drinking snakebite and lucozade all night then thrown up."

"A £400k potato print"

"I've vomited better looking logos."

"I cant see anything but Lisa Simpson giving head"

We beseech the PM (either the incumbent or his successor) to do all in his power to have the logo changed. We have no desire to embarrass either the British nation or the Olympic movement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
